    • Uses of Joint in com.flowpowered.react.constraint

      Subclasses of Joint in com.flowpowered.react.constraint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BallAndSocketJoint
      This class represents a ball-and-socket joint that allows arbitrary rotation between two bodies.
      class  FixedJoint
      This class represents a fixed joint that is used to forbid any translation or rotation between two bodies.
      class  HingeJoint
      This class represents a hinge joint that allows arbitrary rotation between two bodies around a single axis.
      class  SliderJoint
      This class represents a slider joint.
